Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Idecabtagene vicleucel is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: multiple myeloma that has come back or did not respond to treatment. It is used in adults who have received at least two lines of treatment that included an immunomodulating agent, a proteasome inhibitor, and an anti-CD38 monoclonal antibody

Section.Para: It is used in adults who have received at least two lines of treatment that included an immunomodulating agent, a proteasome inhibitor, and an anti-CD38 monoclonal antibody.
Idecabtagene vicleucel is only available as part of a program called Abecma REMS (Risk Evaluation and Mitigation Strategies).
